task.title: Directions to Shanks Hall from Blacksburg

taskbody.context:
Users that are traveling to Shanks from the town of Blacksburg can follow these simple instructions to ensure their arrival to the building.
Source: www.vt.edu

step.cmd: Drive northwest on North Main St. (i.e. from Mellow Mushroom to Sharkey's) toward Jackson St. NE.
Turn left onto Turner St. at the stoplight.
Follow Turner St. past McDonald's, Substation, and Zaxby's.
Follow the signs and directions posted along the street and parking lots to park in the Perry St. parking garage.
Walk East from the parking garage toward Barger St.
Make a slight right onto campus grounds and Shanks Hall will be right in front of you and its official univeristy-issued sign will be visible.
